org.eclipse.californium.core.network

Interface CoapStackFactory


  • public interface CoapStackFactory
    Factory for CoapStack. Either provided to the CoapEndpoint.CoapEndpointBuilder or set as default CoapEndpoint.setDefaultCoapStackFactory(CoapStackFactory).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CoapStack createCoapStack(String protocol, NetworkConfig config, Outbox outbox)
      Create CoapStack.

    • Method Detail

      • createCoapStack

        CoapStack createCoapStack(String protocol,
                        NetworkConfig config,
                        Outbox outbox)
        Create CoapStack.
        Parameters:
        protocol - used protocol, values see Connector.getProtocol().
        config - network configuration used for this coap stack
        outbox - outbox to be used for this coap stack
        Returns:
        create coap stack-
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any parameter is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if protocol is not supported.
